text: 3.9 Mat 25.34, Lom 12.14, 1 Te 5.15 Binɨb nɨbop mɨlɨk nɨŋɨd gɨ tɨmel gɨpal ak, pen mɨlɨk nɨŋɨd gɨ tɨmel ma gɨnɨmɨb. Nɨbop agjupal ak, pen ma agjunɨmɨb. Nɨbi pen anɨgɨnɨmɨb. Binɨb nɨbop gɨ tɨmel gɨpal ak, God nop agnɨgem, kɨlop gɨtep gɨnɨmuŋ. God ne nɨbi anɨgɨl gɨtep gɨnɨmɨb agɨl gos nɨŋɨd, nɨbop suk agak. Anɨgem, ne nɨbop pen gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab.
